marklogic.body:
<strong>If we had to Depend on wind, solar and algae power to Heat and cool our homes, we would be up chit creek with no paddle. Obama is reckless to try to kill the coal industry and to stop drilling for oil. Now is the time to get the ball rolling. Some of that money used for the Solyndra type companies would have been better spent building a new refinery.
The Obama administration are INEPT. Obama seems to be at cross-purposes with with is good for the USA.
GOP 2012
